data.text:
@OldKerry Yes no door to door ministry or in person congregation meetings . Letter writing has been the main way of preaching for Two years now.  

No big deal , if you don’t want to study the Bible , just move on … if you do wanna learn more , we are willing to teach.
@OldKerry It makes me angry because these people are committing themselves without realizing that they are promoting a criminal organization... and really frustrating to see all this
@OldKerry I got one last week and had the same thought. It's kinda sad 😂
